plasma.target.name.title: Target name
plasma.target.name.description: name of the target the plasma source is acting on, either directly or mediated by a medium. E.g. Si waver, distilled water, Escherichia coli

plasma.target.properties.title: Properties
plasma.target.properties.description: properties of the target the plasma source is acting on. E.g. silicon wafer: 100 mm diameter, prime grade orientation 100, E. coli

plasma.target.procedure.title: Procedure
plasma.target.procedure.description: procedure to prepare the target (pre-treatment) and handling throughout plasma treatment. E.g. E. coli prepared on glass substrate according to internal procedure
